siteMetadata.title: Blog by Murtaza Bagwala
siteMetadata.subtitle: A place where I love to share my opinions and experiences.

frontmatter.title: The Verbs who rule the City of Nouns
frontmatter.description: Now the time has changed. Verbs have shown their strength, Verbs are set free and people are now realising their powers. But, the question is how such transformation took place in the kingdom where verbs were treated as slave and the Nouns had entirely ousted the Verbs. so, there is a story behind this.
